p: To analyze ICAM-1 (CD54) and VCAM-1 (CD106) expression cells were incubated with normal human serum for 20 min at 4 °C and then incubated with CD54-PECY5 or CD106-APC antibodies for 30 min at 4 °C. After incubations cells were washed with PBS. Then, the cells were fixed with formaldehyde 2% and evaluated by flow cytometry.
